name: Better Next LVL
description:
Haha you just a little tiny square and a basic world.
BUT- if you are good enough you can evolve and upgrade the whole game!! Are you enough skilled to complete every levels in this platformer game before the end of the short timer? :)
A- Move to the left
D- Move to the right
SPACE- To jump
Collect every souls in the level and evolve and teleport to the next level!!


Evolve and go to a different & better level!

Psst: Everything in this game is made by us (graphics, code, musics..)
So make sure to follow every members of the team if you liked the game^^

- Code & Music: https://developer-x.itch.io/
- Sound Design & SFX artist : https://pieroqg1.itch.io/
- Pixel artist & Levels designer : https://lifesteal.itch.io/
